name: My Tsundere Femboy
description:
My Tsundere Femboy is a short erotic kinetic visual novel where you play as the typical depiction of a gooner protagonist, a wanker and a loser.

One day, while preparing to go to your exploitative job, you meet your landlady's effeminate son, Birch, a lecherous femboy with a harsh personality.
What kind of lewd things will you do inside that apartment of yours?

Features:
  • Gorgeous H-Scenes between men
  • ~2K words
